body: A merciful healer must choose the Healing domain. She does not gain a second domain. If the cleric worships a deity, that deity must be one that grants the Healing domain. A merciful healer must channel positive energy.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Cleric/Cleric Archetypes/Merciful Healer/Willing Healer
name: Willing Healer
